1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:"I was with the Messenger of Allah on a journey, and he said: 'Is there any water?' He performed ablution and wiped over his leather socks, then he joined the army and led them (in prayer)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَسْحِ عَلَى الْخُفَّيْنِ
